info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central New Haven County through 615 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Litchfield, or 9 miles southwest of Torrington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Meriden, Wallingford, Naugatuck, Wolcott, Cheshire, Prospect and Middlebury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southern Connecticut.
